nodes.text: CGR-80, also known as Seeger, was a Ceremony, Gala, and Ritual droid with masculine programming, yellow photoreceptors, and gold plating that was active during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Marriages through the Terms of Bonding, and Rodian harvest festivals were among the many rituals and ceremonies that the protocol droid was capable of performing.

CGR-80 first appeared in the conversation "A Modest Proposal" with Doc, a companion character for the Jedi Knight class in the 2011 BioWare video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. If female Knights accept Doc's proposal of marriage, he will summon CGR-80, and the droid will marry the two of them with the Terms of Bonding.
